Hello! This time I'll be talking with Saori Onoda from Tsubaki Factory and Nanami Kubota from Ocha no Oma!

And the Tea Horse Tour will be starting soon!
Yay!

That's right.
I thought it was wonderful, and I wish I had a chance to do it.
That's right.
That's why I thought it was so wonderful, and I wish I had the chance to do something about it.
Thank you very much.

We will only be able to tour 3 places.
I feel so sad.
I'm feeling very sad, but I'm also very determined to put my heart into these three places, so we're all going to work together as one and do our best.

Saori Onoda of Tsubaki Factory and Nanami Kubota of Ocha-no-Oma will be presenting "Halo! station.
On March 10, Tsubaki Factory's major debut 7th anniversary live "REALIZE" was held.
We performed with a live band for this live, and we also performed with a live band for the 6th anniversary live,
I was very happy to be able to perform with a live band again this year.
I wanted to create a live performance that could only be done with a live band,
We wanted to create a live show that could only be performed by a live band, so we decided to have an acoustic version, or a version that could only be heard at this live performance,
One of the challenges for this year's concert was to perform with a microphone stand for the first time among the current members,
I was very excited to see them perform with a microphone stand for the first time, which is something you don't see often in idol performances,
It was the first time for many of us to do something like that,
We all practiced how to use it and how to use it together, and tried to dress up a little,
I think it's a live performance that everyone thought up together.
